amendment.description: Amendment sought to amend title II by requiring Federal agencies to provide an estimate of the benefits of proposed regulations and by requiring the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs to include the total benefits of proposed and final agency rules in the annual cumulative assessment of agency rule making required by the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 114-388 to amend Title II of H.R. 712 by requiring federal agencies to provide an estimate of the benefits of proposed regulations. Would also require the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs to include the total benefits of proposed and final agency rules in the annual cumulative assessment of agency rule making required by the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 235 (Roll no. 9).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 235 (Roll no. 9).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Lynch.
